entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App assumes dark mode after resume on device with UIAlertController presented #21986
  • .NET MAUI > Publish iOS Enterprise App > Wrong Profile #21984
  • GradientBrushes are not supported on Shape.Stroke #21983
  • ListView shows two items on one line and crashes when clicking (windows) #21981
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate (custom image) does not render correctly on ItemsSource change (Android & iOS) #21980
  • [ci] Security tasks #21979
    .NET 8 SR5
  • ToolbarItem property not updated when PropertyChanged is triggered in the ViewModel #21976
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id #21975
  • ListView/CollectionView faulty height calculation in Grid with multiple columns #21974
  • Android crash at startup with System.ArgumentNullException: ArgumentNull_Generic Arg_ParamName_Name, services on MauiApplication #21973
  • Picker Crash App on iOS Simulation #21972
  • Terrible performance of MAUI Shell Tabs #21971
  • Layout cycle crash on Windows with Button with image inside FlexLayout #21970

Closed

  • Maui Hybrid: build fails when adding json file to ./Resources/Raw #17078
  • Breakpoints do not work when debugging configuration other than Debug #20132
  • The "XamlCTask" task failed unexpectedly. #21910
  • [Testing] Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21410
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [8.0.10] Windows FontImageSourceService assumes MSIX packaging #21333
    .NET 8 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-generate template localization #21988
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄

Merged

  • add unit test for EnumerableExtensions #21978
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] `GesturePlatformManager.Windows.cs` - unused variable #21953
    community ✨
  • IndexOf() stackOverflow fix (#20083) #21965
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Fix apiscan version for net9 #21977
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Updated

  • [iOS] Add UITest for #21806 #21951
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • [Windows] Remove 2nd WebView used to add `base` tag when using HtmlWebViewSource #21892
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures
  • Add unit test for button images in layouts #21651
    area/testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, stale
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, control-picker
  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes - Fix #21826
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) #21818
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Optimize ordering of children in Flex layout #21961
    area/layout 🔲, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, layout-flex
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests #21840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
